name: Fools Errand - Testing Adventure Creator
description:
Well, this little guy has lost his hat somewhere, and he can't recall where he put it after his last act!

Is it in the pub, the yard? Who knows. 

Can you help him to find his jester hat and end the most mundane of quests ever??

This little grey box prototype game was started in the Lockdowns. It was a training exercise for learning a new process and a new set of tools that can be purchased for Unity.  It is a rough game... with bugs in spots! But hopefully, it will entertain some of you out there - especially as it is free. It is a game that harks back to the old point and clicks adventures of yore!

Controls
 Point and click without a mouse cursor. Right-click and wheel through, Use, Talk, Examine. 

The top bar is the inventory.
Bottom left is the main menu. Make sure to save your game.

Credits : "This Lot"
I will would like to say a special thank you to everybody that puts up with my nonsense.  Mum, Dad, Family - the cat that sits on the shed.

And a big thank you to the playtesters -
Ritchie, Stu, and Helen - my dearest other half.

This game is for education only and is not for profit. Games
